summary: [ADULT MOD] This mod makes werewolves more...ferocious...
descriptionHtml:
This mod has been made quicky. I take it as it is, a funny thing to watch and that\'s all. If you don\'t like it (easily understanable) just skip it.

This mod player\'s beast blood very hot !

Install
=======
1. Use NMM or just put \"meshes\" and \"textures\" into the skyrim \"data\" folder.

Uninstall
=========
1. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod.

Incompatibility
===============
Incompatible with \"Derrax Male Werewolves\".


History
=======
1.0 :quick release

Licensing/Legal
===============
You must contact me and obtain my permission before re-packaging any part of
this mod. If I do not respond within 2 weeks, feel free to do whatever you
like with this mod.
author: Snork12
